attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mohamed al-Fayed has done for Britain a lot more than many thousands of immigrants that have already been awarded British citizenship have done. Mohamed al-Fayed is not just the owner of Harrods. He has become a national institution.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
